name: perl-test-leaktrace

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Test::LeakTrace provides several functions that trace memory leaks. This
module scans arenas, the memory allocation system, so it can detect any
leaked SVs in given blocks.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependent_to.name: perl-template-toolkit
dependent_to.description: Template - Front-end module to the Template Toolkit.
